content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hi! I need someone to check the wiring in my living room. One of the outlets is sparking.
We can help with that! May I please have your name to get started with your request?
Thank you, Mark. Can you please provide your address so we can check if you're in our service area?
It's 52… Wait, I actually don't remember the full address. We just moved and I'm honestly blanking on the exact number right now. Can I get back to you in a bit?
No worries, Mark! Whenever you have your full address ready, just let us know and we can continue with your booking.
reason: Customer unable to provide full address; booking on hold until address provided.
